name: Timber (TheDarkRyze, Renas, DannyIsYog, Carlosmvs)
description:
Timber is a game about a tribe of characters rebuilding their home in the woods.

You control how fast the time goes. By pressing down a button (any) or your screen the time will go by faster. Use it to your advantage in order to improve your home and watch your tribe evolve into the next level.

The idea is simple, you cannot directly interact with the world around you, however you can make time go faster. 

Made by a team at GameDev Técnico


 Credits:
Carlos Sousa  |  Fábio Sousa  |  Manuel Guimarães  | Renata Candeias

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com . 
Built in Unity.
